page.title: 20Colvend: Transport
page.content: Most people in this area have cars. Without a car it would be difficult to get anywhere.It takes about half an hour to drive to Dumfries. There is a regular bus service run by Carruthers from Dumfries to Rock- cliffe.The bus goes along the coast road calling at little villages on the way.The journey takes an hour and a quarter. There are four buses each day and three on Sundays. A private mini-bus goes from Barend Holiday Camp,Sandyhills to Dalbeattie. It will pick up passengers but usually only if this has been arranged in advance. In school term time a School Bus takes the children from outlying areas to Dalbeattie Primary School,and all the children to the Secondary School. It passes our school gates twice a day but no one gets off or on!
